channel.title: Pkforever 508-525 Need Some Fix Ups!
channel.description:
Hey Welcome to Pkforever! I need some adjustments to somethings about Godwars Pkforever is a pking / minigame Features Barrows Godwars Working 90% all bosses with animation ( 10 kc) Fight Pits Castle Wars Working 100% Quest Tab Tele Grand Exchnage Working! Pest Control! Clan Chat Works 100% Godsword Staces and Specs! D claws and spec! Statius Armor and Hammer Dragon Plate no glitched! Bounty Hunting working 100% Duel Arena Works 100% with staking and adjustment rules! And more! Player Commands ::master ::pure ::mypkpointz ::players ::yell ::capes Mod Commands All Player Commands ::mute ::unmute ::ipmute Admin Commands All Mod Commands ::banuser ::unbanuser ::item
Some Pictures
Ummm I try to Upload Pics but the pictures will either show up very small or just wont show up soo if someone could help me that would be greeat! :D
All Staff is Open! Owner- Nic Co-Owners- None Admins- None Mods- None
[code]Mod Application Name In Game Name Country Experience? Ever Own A Server? Email How will you advertise? What will you do as Mod[/code]
[code]Admin Application Name In Game Name Age Email Country State Grade Experience? What will you do to make server better? How do you advertise? [/code]
No Application for Co-Owner
[code]Coder Name In Game Name What Can you code? What will you want in return? Email Very Experienced? How long have you been coding Rs-ps? Can you code Java Scripts or Websites?[/code]
Thanks- Nic

item.title: Pkforever 508-525 Need Some Fix Ups!
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Fridder:

^ 4 years? That’s either complete bullshit or you have no life…

Uhh i’ve been coding 5 Years 7 if you include the 2 years i spent just learning what a public int and string were… but i mean its all self thought going to go to college to learn more
but i mean 4 years is very possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Pkforever 508-525 Need Some Fix Ups!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Fridder:

^ 4 years? That’s either complete bullshit or you have no life…

I’ve been with RSPS for almost five.

OT: Good luck with the development, but I would recommend adding some media, and make this development worth reading. The thread is kind of dead as it is, but can be brought back to life, at least take the effort to organize it.

Read full topic
